SELECT
t.dept_nm dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc dept_nm_desc,
"all" dept_nm, "全部" dept_nm_desc,
t.statt_dt statt_dt, SUM(tbl_data_qty ) tbl_data_qty, SUM(t.tbl_data_spa) tbl_data_spa, SUM(t.tbl_day_data_exchg_qty) tbl_day_data_exchg_qty FROM r_res_tbl_exchg_statt t WHERE t.statt_dt BETWEEN date_sub(#{sDate}, interval 30 DAY) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND t.dept_nm = #{deptNm}
GROUP BY
t.dept_nm_desc, t.dept_nm,
t.statt_dt ORDER BY t.statt_dt ASC

SELECT
t.dept_nm dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc dept_nm_desc,
"all" dept_nm, "全部" dept_nm_desc,
t.statt_dt statt_dt, SUM(t.tbl_day_data_exchg_qty) tbl_day_data_exchg_qty FROM r_res_tbl_exchg_statt t WHERE t.statt_dt BETWEEN date_sub(#{sDate}, interval 5 DAY) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND t.dept_nm = #{deptNm}
GROUP BY
t.dept_nm_desc, t.dept_nm,
t.statt_dt ORDER BY t.statt_dt ASC
SELECT * FROM r_dept_desc t ORDER BY t.dept_nm ASC

SELECT t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') statt_dt, SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) tbl_data_qty FROM r_res_tbl_exchg_statt t WHERE date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{sDate}, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, t.statt_dt ORDER BY SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') statt_dt, SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) tbl_data_qty FROM r_res_tbl_exchg_statt t WHERE date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{sDate}, interval 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, t.statt_dt ORDER BY SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') statt_dt, SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) tbl_data_qty FROM r_res_tbl_exchg_statt t WHERE date_format(t.statt_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(#{sDate}, interval 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.dept_nm, t.dept_nm_desc, t.statt_dt ORDER BY SUM(t.tbl_data_qty) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
k.dept_nm dept_nm, k.dept_nm_desc dept_nm_desc,
"all" dept_nm, "全部" dept_nm_desc,
k.job_fail_hr, COUNT(1) fail_count FROM r_24_hr_fail_job_distr k, ( SELECT
t.dept_nm,
MAX(t.statt_dt) statt_dt FROM r_24_hr_fail_job_distr t
GROUP BY t.dept_nm
) m WHERE k.statt_dt = m.statt_dt
AND k.dept_nm = m.dept_nm and k.dept_nm = #{deptNm}
GROUP BY
k.dept_nm_desc, k.dept_nm,
k.job_fail_hr ORDER BY k.job_fail_hr
